dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: notation
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table stores notes associated with specific attributes in the plot data model.

entity.entitySummary: This table is where notations associated with plot observations are stored.
entity.entityDescription: All notes associated with plots and plot observations are stored in this table. These notes are linked to a specific plotObservation (and potentially to a table/attribute associated with the aforementioned observation) through the notationIntersectionTable.

attribute.attDefinition: Primary key in the notation table.
This column stores the notation text.
The date on which the notation was stored in the database.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the vegPlotParty table.
attribute.attDefinition: The column stores the reference to the party (vegPlotParty) table that is associated with the note.

This column stores the type of notation stored in this row. Business rules dictate that values in this cell may contain the following values: databaseManagement, databaseUser and internal. 'databaseManagemnet' notes are those added by the data manager and may be queried by the public. 'databaseUser' are notes entered by the users of the database and too are publicly viewable. 'internal' notes are for management to use internally and not broadcast.
